com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.view
Class WPMenu

java.lang.Object
  com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.view.WPMenu

public class WPMenu
extends java.lang.Object

Used to simulate the effect of the "AppBar," the bottom row of clickable icons. Works in a similar fashion as the default Android menus. This menu is the antithesis of WPContextMenu, while is menu is image only, the context menu is text-only.

Based on William J Francis's (w.j.francis@tx.rr.com) CustomMenu. http://www.codeproject.com/KB/android/AndroidMenusMyWay.aspx

Change log: Version 1.01

  • Icon and support for Drawables when icon is pressed.
Version 1.02
  • Orientation-aware positioning.

Since:
05-13-2012

addMenuItems

public void addMenuItems(int[] ids,
                         int[] drawables)
ids and drawables must be of the same length. ids[i] must correspond to drawables[i].

Parameters:
ids - List of integer ids.
drawables - List of drawable resource ids.

addMenuItems

                         int[] drawables,
                         int[] drawablesDown)
ids and drawables must be of the same length. ids[i] must correspond to drawables[i].

Parameters:
ids - List of integer ids.
drawables - List of drawable resource ids.
drawablesDown - List of drawable resource ids to be used when the menu item is pressed down.

addMenuItems

public void addMenuItems(int[] ids,
                         int[] drawables,
                         int[] drawablesDown,
                         int[] captions)
ids and drawables must be of the same length. ids[i] must correspond to drawables[i].

Parameters:
ids - List of integer ids.
drawables - List of drawable resource ids.
drawablesDown - List of drawable resource ids to be used when the menu item is pressed down.

addMenuItems

public void addMenuItems(int[] ids,
                         int[][] drawables)
ids and drawables must be of the same length. ids[i] must correspond to drawables[0][i] for the normal drawables and drawables[1][i] for the drawable to be used when the icon is pressed.

Parameters:
ids - List of integer ids.
drawables - List of drawable resource ids with a length of two where the first item is an array of drawable ids and the second is an array of drawables to be used when the icon is pressed down.
